BUILDING UP THE COMMUNITY.name: Building Up The Community
BUILDING UP THE COMMUNITY.description: A 501c3 charitable organization that provides resources to the black, brown & LGBTQ+ communities. Our focus is homelessness, financial literacy, food initiative & domestic violence awareness. We service men, women, families & teens in the Atlanta Georgia.

Computer Museum of America.name: Computer Museum of America
Computer Museum of America.description: Computer Museum of America (CMoA) is a 501(c)3 non-profit created to preserve the history of the digital era. In the past half century, computing has grown from a few gadgets to an almost universal extension of human life. Yet while computing has become commonplace, the history of its innovation is being lost every day, as 'old' technology is discarded, recycled, or consigned to the landfill.

Food For Thought.name: Food For Thought
Food For Thought.description: The Food for Thought Project is an ongoing, grassroots, door to door community food collection service. The Food For Thought Project collects over 30,000 pounds of food annually for Forsyth County food banks.

Gardenia Mediterranean Restaurant.description: Serve home made cooking based on Meditertanean healthy diet using ex. VIRGIN olive oil and spices . And a lot of fresh healthy salads and fresh veggies
Gardenia Mediterranean Restaurant.name: Gardenia Mediterranean Restaurant

Gwinnett Environmental & Heritage Center.name: Gwinnett Environmental & Heritage Center
Gwinnett Environmental & Heritage Center.description: Interactive hands-on exhibits, U.S. Green Building Council Design Strategies, Community rooms, Catering kitchen, Rental rooms, Chesser-Williams Historic House and Ivy Creek Greenway (5.45 miles).

Ice Cream Social.name: Ice Cream Social
Ice Cream Social.description: More than just ice cream...a delectable experience! Step into this beautiful boutique ice cream parlor offering 36 flavors of premium ice cream, milkshakes and specialty sundaes. We also have dairy free, gluten free and no sugar added options! Gourmet candy, snacks, coffee and unique retail items make Ice Cream Social a destination for all ages! Order your custom ice cream cake or plan your next birthday party or event at Ice Cream Social

Meals By Grace.name: Meals By Grace
Meals By Grace.description: Meals by Grace meets weekly to create a hot meal and distribute all donated food supplies to children and their families recommended to us by the school social workers. These meals and additional food stuffs are delivered to the children who have no access to food pantries or other meals due to lack of transportation.

Northeast Georgia History Center.name: Northeast Georgia History Center
Northeast Georgia History Center.description: The Northeast Georgia History Center opened in 2004 and is home to the 18th century White Path Cabin, a working blacksmith shop, exhibits, and galleries that span 10,000 years of our region's rich history.

Rise Against Hunger.name: Rise Against Hunger
Rise Against Hunger.description: In 1998, envisioning a world without hunger, Ray Buchanan - a United Methodist  minister - founded Stop Hunger. Driving Rise Against Hunger’s work is the recognition that ending hunger is more than just feeding people, which led Rise Against Hunger to focus its feeding programs in areas where we can have a real impact and expand its hunger-fighting programs beyond meal packaging and distribution.

Senior Services North Fulton.name: Senior Services North Fulton
Senior Services North Fulton.description: Senior Services is a non-profit human services organization. We have 7 senior centers: Roswell, Alpharetta, Milton, Sandy Springs. New Horizon, Auburn and Dogwood. Senior Services provides services such as: Case Management, Transportation, Meals on Wheels, Homemaker Services and Referral Services.

Six Flags Over Georgia.description: Sprawling amusement park featuring high-speed roller coasters & water attractions, plus kids' rides.
Six Flags Over Georgia.name: Six Flags Over Georgia

Southeastern Railway Museum.name: Southeastern Railway Museum
Southeastern Railway Museum.description: The Southeastern Railway Museum is a railroad museum located in Duluth, Georgia, in suburban Atlanta. The museum was founded in 1970 by the Atlanta Chapter of the National Railway Historical Society. There are over 90 pieces of rolling stock exhibited on the 30-acre site.

Tam's Backstage.name: Tam's Backstage
Tam's Backstage.description: Steak, seafood & other American fare served in a historic building with exposed-brick walls

The Taste Street.name: The Taste Street
The Taste Street.description: Wanna try the best street food in town? If you're looking for amazing traditional street food, then you've gotta try The Taste Street. We offer a variety of delicious dishes from Colombia and Mexico, including Bandeja Paisa, Street Tacos, Burritos and Quesadillas, Street Burger, Hot Dogs, and Pizza…

Village Burger.name: Village Burger
Village Burger.description: Village Burger is a family friendly restaurant with delicious food and friendly service. We don't have freezers so all our food is fresh and made in house daily. We have burgers, sandwiches, hot dogs, hand cut fries and hand battered onion rings, salads, chicken, ice cream and beer and wine.

World of Coca-Cola.name: World of Coca-Cola
World of Coca-Cola.description: At World of Coca-Cola, you will experience the world's most famous beverage in a dynamic, multimedia attraction where moments of happiness and wonder can be found around every corner.
